Key Match Events: Wyatt Langford hit a walk-off home run in the 9th inning to give the Rangers a 7-4 victory over the Yankees

Post-Match Reflections: The Rangers' manager expressed pride in his team's ability to come back from a 4-1 deficit and win the game in dramatic fashion
The Yankees' manager was disappointed in his team's performance in the 8th inning, but praised his team's resilience in coming back to tie the game
